title: MS Dhoni:An Army Stint, A Game Of Pool And Now Playing Football
text:
An Army Stint, A Game Of Pool And Now Playing Football - This His How MS Dhoni Is Enjoying His Time Off From Cricket

An Army Stint, A Game Of Pool And Now Playing Football - This His How MS Dhoni Is Enjoying His Time Off From Cricket

Since India lost in the semis of the World Cup to New Zealand, MS Dhoni has not represented the Men in Blue, having been on a break. Meanwhile there has been s lot of speculation as to when and if he will retire with Rishabh Pant being tipped to take his place across formats.

Dhoni spent some time with the Indian Army serving in Kashmir. One must remember that he is an honarary Lieutenant Colonel in the Indian Territorial Army. Captain Cool spent 15 days in Kashmir..

After that he participated in an amateur golf tournament in USA and then returned to Ranchi where he was also seen having a go at pool.

Don't Miss 1.6 K SHARES

Now he's been seen playing football with the likes of Arjun Kapoor. Check it out:

Meanwhile people are curious when he will call time on his career. One thing is for certain that he will go out on his own terms. Dhoni has represented India in over 500 international games since his debut in 2004. His reputation as a skipper, keeper and finisher has made him second him to none.

With Inputs From TNN.
